languages.text:
"...Было! Но воина душу тоска не язвит,
Знал он, что встретит однажды товарищей снова,
Проклятье поправ и с честью погибнув в бою!"

"...So it was!
But anguish does not plague
the warrior's soul.
He knew one day
his brothers he would meet again,
once the curse was broken
and his honourable death
he claimed in battle!"
languages.original_text:
"...Было! Но воина душу тоска не язвит,
Знал он, что встретит однажды товарищей снова,
Проклятье поправ и с честью погибнув в бою!"

traits.locale_text:
"...So it was!
But anguish does not plague
the warrior's soul.
He knew one day
his brothers he would meet again,
once the curse was broken
and his honourable death
he claimed in battle!"

"...So it was!
But anguish does not plague
the warrior's soul.
He knew one day
his brothers he would meet again,
once the curse was broken
and his honourable death
he claimed in battle!"

"...Было! Но воина душу тоска не язвит,
Знал он, что встретит однажды товарищей снова,
Проклятье поправ и с честью погибнув в бою!"

"...So it was!
But anguish does not plague
the warrior's soul.
He knew one day
his brothers he would meet again,
once the curse was broken
and his honourable death
he claimed in battle!"

languages.text:
「…彼は生きている！
しかし、戦士の魂は
苦悩に蝕まれなかった。
彼はいつか
呪いが解ければ
兄弟と再会し
名誉ある死を
戦場で遂げるだろう！」
languages.original_text:
"...So it was!
But anguish does not plague
the warrior's soul.
He knew one day
his brothers he would meet again,
once the curse was broken
and his honourable death
he claimed in battle!"

traits.locale_text:
「…彼は生きている！
しかし、戦士の魂は
苦悩に蝕まれなかった。
彼はいつか
呪いが解ければ
兄弟と再会し
名誉ある死を
戦場で遂げるだろう！」

languages.text:
“……不过如此！
但这种痛苦，
不会折磨战士的灵魂。
因为他深知终有一天，
诅咒会被打破，
他将殒身于光荣的战场，
与亲爱的兄弟们再会！”
languages.original_text:
"...So it was!
But anguish does not plague
the warrior's soul.
He knew one day
his brothers he would meet again,
once the curse was broken
and his honourable death
he claimed in battle!"

traits.locale_text:
“……不过如此！
但这种痛苦，
不会折磨战士的灵魂。
因为他深知终有一天，
诅咒会被打破，
他将殒身于光荣的战场，
与亲爱的兄弟们再会！”

languages.text:
« Ainsi s'acheva-t-il !
Mais l'angoisse n'affligeait pas
l'âme du guerrier.
Il savait qu'un jour,
il retrouverait ses frères,
une fois libéré de sa malédiction
et une mort honorable acquise
dans le fracas des armes ! »
languages.original_text:
"...So it was!
But anguish does not plague
the warrior's soul.
He knew one day
his brothers he would meet again,
once the curse was broken
and his honourable death
he claimed in battle!"

traits.locale_text:
« Ainsi s'acheva-t-il !
Mais l'angoisse n'affligeait pas
l'âme du guerrier.
Il savait qu'un jour,
il retrouverait ses frères,
une fois libéré de sa malédiction
et une mort honorable acquise
dans le fracas des armes ! »

languages.text:
«... ¡Y así fue!
Pero la angustia no asoló
el alma del guerrero.
Sabía que un día
a sus hermanos de nuevo encontraría,
cuando la maldición se rompiera
y la muerte honorable
en batalla obtenido hubiera!».
languages.original_text:
"...So it was!
But anguish does not plague
the warrior's soul.
He knew one day
his brothers he would meet again,
once the curse was broken
and his honourable death
he claimed in battle!"

traits.locale_text:
«... ¡Y así fue!
Pero la angustia no asoló
el alma del guerrero.
Sabía que un día
a sus hermanos de nuevo encontraría,
cuando la maldición se rompiera
y la muerte honorable
en batalla obtenido hubiera!».

languages.text:
"... So war es!
Doch Pein plagt nicht
die Seele des Kriegers.
Er wusste, eines Tages
würde er seine Brüder wiedersehen,
wenn der Fluch gebrochen war
und er seinen ehrenhaften Tod
im Kampf errungen hatte!"
languages.original_text:
"...So it was!
But anguish does not plague
the warrior's soul.
He knew one day
his brothers he would meet again,
once the curse was broken
and his honourable death
he claimed in battle!"

traits.locale_text:
"... So war es!
Doch Pein plagt nicht
die Seele des Kriegers.
Er wusste, eines Tages
würde er seine Brüder wiedersehen,
wenn der Fluch gebrochen war
und er seinen ehrenhaften Tod
im Kampf errungen hatte!"

languages.text:
"Öyleydi de!
Fakat keder ele geçiremedi
Savaşçının ruhunu.
Bir gün kardeşleriyle
Tekrar buluşacağına emindi.
Lanet bozulacak,
Onurlu sonuna da
Savaşta kavuşacaktı!"
languages.original_text:
"...So it was!
But anguish does not plague
the warrior's soul.
He knew one day
his brothers he would meet again,
once the curse was broken
and his honourable death
he claimed in battle!"

traits.locale_text:
"Öyleydi de!
Fakat keder ele geçiremedi
savaşçının ruhunu.
Bir gün kardeşleriyle
tekrar buluşacağına emindi,
lanet bozulduğunda.
Onurlu sonuna da
savaşta kavuştu!"
